Reviews.Title: They made it right
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: I purchased this accessory kit and the telephoto and wide angle lenses did not fit the 18-55mm lens that they stated they would fit.  The 18-55mm lens is 58mm and the ones in the kit are for a 52mm lens, when I contacted them they sent me out the right ones and an item that was missing they sent it out right away.  The customer service was very good. I was pleased at how they handled the situation.

Reviews.Title: evaluate the product
Reviews.Author: sultan
Reviews.Content: this product is good but not the same items that discribed or shown in the picture. the tripod , video flas  wich is normal flash) and flash diffuser are totaly different than the picture.
